Text:
That was fast, thanks! DL both now. 

And the size of this one is almost twice as the 1st half? Interesting...
@Ballrunn : You will come to know why the size is more after you start watching it.

Hey Footy!

Thanks a lot,dude!

I'll certainly keep seeding it for days.
Ta mate, I appreciate your effort

I've waited a couple of days to post this as I imagine most have seen or now know the result. But Ballrunn, PLEASE don't post comments like you did in future! I deliberately didn't look at the file sizes because I know that can be a give away, but YOURS was the 1st comment which without trying I flash read!  And I instantly knew there'd be extra time and therefore knew the score after 90 minutes! Cheers!!!!

NOT clever!
EdoSensei, you'll be surprised at how many still don't know the result even after a couple of days or even weeks, so the only one here posting a spoiler is you.
I get EdoSensei point, albiondean. The guy really gives a clue about the result.
